column4: Hi guys, I have a laptop and I'm having a problem with the sound system when I pluged in my headfone the speakers still working. I have the Ubuntu 9.04 installed anybody can help about it?
have you messed with the volume settings?
most of the time i've fixed my sound issues by just screwing around with all the different volume settings
I've tried to use the sound settings but It does not work at all. I've heard something about alsa sorround because I've noticed that that sound is divided in my speakers and headfone
